com.uiza.sdk.view

Class UZPlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uiza.sdk.view.UZPlayerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource.MediaSourceFactory, PreviewLoader

    public final class UZPlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource.MediaSourceFactory
    Manages the ExoPlayer, the IMA plugin and all video playback.
